title: [Question] Please recommend PGs/Flats near PES RR.
content: Hi, i'll be a second year student this upcoming semester, and i want to take a PG this time,but the thing is after searching for hourse end,me and my friend still haven't found a decent one. I request all the seniors to lemme know about PGs. if you happen to reside in one,please dm me.

comments.body: Sobha Valley View, Skyline Ambrosia, Navami Landmark
